item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Prime 16

Prime 16 is great little burger joint with the best selection of draft and bottled beers in downtown. Several members have requested to me that we come here for next time we needed a go to location, so Prime we shall go this week.

They will be Opening late due to the holiday, so special information is not available yet. We will let you know if/when it becomes available.

Your contact is AJ, who may run a little late but will be there. His cell phone is 315-345-9348, you can call or text.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: If you're having trouble, try my cell phone at 315-345-9348, though it's not a big place so look around.
item.name: Happy Hour - Prime 16
